files.patch: @@ -1315,5 +1315,0 @@ - -test.timeout.default.seconds -Not Available -The default timeout value in seconds for the test. -

@@ -40,1 +40,1 @@
-	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: passed: 4; failed: 2' $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log)  > /dev/null
+	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: passed: 3; failed: 2' $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log)  > /dev/null

-import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
-
-import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
-import org.junit.jupiter.api.io.TempDir;
-
-/*
- * @test
- * @bug 7903961
- * @run junit JupiterTimeoutTest
- */
-class JupiterTimeoutTest {
-    @Test
-    void test() {
-        String actual = System.getProperty("test.timeout.default.seconds", "-1");
-        assertEquals("123", actual, "unexpected default value for timeout seconds");
-    }
-}
